rules.name: myRule_29
rules.label: Check QBO -> Pull & Store Seports & W2s

value.stringValue: CASE( TEXT([Task].Tax_Return_Needed__c), "Yes, Skip BK","Start Return", "Not Needed","Not Necessary", "Yes, with BK","Start Return", "","Check Intuit Link", "ERROR: Contact Greg" )

formulas.name: formula_8_myRule_7_A1_8539423390
formulas.expression: CASE( TEXT({!myVariable_current.Tax_Return_Needed__c}), "Yes, Skip BK","Start Return", "Not Needed","Not Necessary", "Yes, with BK","Start Return", "","Check Intuit Link", "ERROR: Contact Greg" )

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Current_Opp_Stage__c = "Start Return", CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Setup Locator") )
AND( ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Current_Opp_Stage__c = "Confirm Organizer Receipt", CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Confirm Organizer Receipt") )

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Current_Opp_Stage__c = "Prepare Tax Return", CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Prepare Tax Return") )

AND( ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Current_Opp_Stage__c = "File Return", CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"File Return") )
